# KIRO_MCP Learning Data Log
# Auto-generated: 2025-11-15 03:02:53
# Purpose: Continuous learning and self-improvement

This folder contains all interaction logs and training data for KIRO_MCP's continuous learning system.

## Structure:
- interactions/ - Agent interaction logs
- patterns/ - Discovered patterns and insights
- knowledge/ - Accumulated knowledge base
- optimizations/ - Performance improvements and fixes
- training/ - Training data for ML models

All data is logged automatically by the agent to enable continuous self-learning.
